entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog at times overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog at times in the morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Thursday 27 April 2023
